dt-option.name: searchPanes.emptyMessage

type.description: By setting the `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` option to a string, any empty cells found in the table will be represented in the pane by that string.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` parameter is `\<i\>No Data\</i\>`.
dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchPanes.emptyMessage`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchPanes regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchPanes`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchPanes.emptyMessage` for full details of this option.
